translations: 装配工；索具装配人；保护架

sentences.sentence: Currently, she is the only existing three decked square rigger.
sentences.translation: 目前，她是唯一现存的三个甲板横帆船。

sentences.sentence: The information you will find in this course will help you whether you are a game rigger of a feature film rigger.
sentences.translation: 信息你会发现在这场比赛将帮助你无论你是游戏故事片起重工索具的。
